name: MySQL5
queryCode:
SELECT
	t1.`YEAR`,
	concat( t1.`YEAR`, RIGHT ( 100+ t1.`MONTH`, 2 ) ) AS `MONTH`,
	t1.`MONTH` as monthorder,
	concat( t1.`MONTH`, 'æœˆ' ) AS monthname 
FROM
	(
SELECT DISTINCT YEAR
	( t1.date ) AS `year`,
	MONTH ( t1.date ) AS `MONTH` 
FROM
	zt_taskestimate t1 
WHERE
	t1.date <> '0000-00-00' 
	) t1
